actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.
Reported to House from the Joint Committee on Atomic Energy, H. Rept. 94-9.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the approval of the Congress of the distribution of amounts of special material to the International Atomic Energy Agency, proposed by the Atomic Energy Commission on January 8, 1975.

summary.text: Expresses congressional approval of the proposed additional amounts of special nuclear material which may be distributed to the International Atomic Energy Agency pursuant to the Atomic Energy Act.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the approval of the Congress of the distribution of amounts of special material to the International Atomic Energy Agency, proposed by the Atomic Energy Commission on January 8, 1975.
